title: Our Team
subtitle: Experienced Professionals
description: Our team comprises highly qualified and experienced professionals from diverse fields dedicated to excellence.

members.name: Dr. Jagadish Chandra Pokhrel
members.qualification: Senior Expert in Urban and Regional Planning
members.bio: Dr. Pokhrel is a senior expert in urban and regional planning with more than 35 years of experience. He served as Vice Chairperson of the National Planning Commission and specializes in policy research.

members.name: Dr. Mukunda Pd Paudyal
members.bio: Dr. Paudyal headed the policy department of the Ministry of Finance and is a former Secretary of the GoN. He specializes in economic analysis, growth diagnostics, and several policy issues.

members.name: Mr. Basant Raj Gautam
members.bio: A former Joint-Secretary of GoN with over 25 years of experience in organizational development and capacity development of federal, provincial, and local governments.

members.name: Dr. Nahakul KC
members.bio: Former Vice-Chairman of Provincial Planning Commission, Lumbini Province and Executive Director of Poverty Alleviation. Currently associated with various governance experts.

members.name: Dr. Keshav Kumar Acharya
members.bio: Dr. Acharya has more than 25 years of experience in Federalism, Public Policy, and Inclusive Governance. He has worked as a researcher at Kathmandu University and the University of New England, Australia.

members.name: Mr. BK Maharjan
members.bio: Mr. Maharjan has over 27 years of experience in planning, solid waste management, and community development. He specializes in MTEF, RIAP, and third-party monitoring.

members.name: Dr. Madhab Panthi
members.bio: Dr. Panthi has over 25 years of experience in MIS/IT. He has been involved as a project bank expert in developing the project bank in Nepal and works at the Institute of Engineering, Pulchowk.

members.name: Dr. Chhabilal Chidi
members.bio: Dr. Chidi has more than 25 years of work experience in GIS, remote sensing, and teaching. He specializes in GIS mapping, spatial analysis, and remote sensing applications.

members.name: Jagannath Adhikari
members.bio: Mr. Adhikari has more than 30 years of experience in planning and community development. He specializes in MTEF, Plan Preparation, RIAP preparation, and Monitoring and Evaluation.

members.name: Ms. Sovita Pariyar
members.bio: Ms. Pariyar has over 25 years of experience in environment, Gender and Social Inclusion (GESI), and local governance. She specializes in Social Audit and Social Accountability.

members.name: Dr. Bhima Dhungana
members.bio: Dr. Dhungana has more than 20 years of experience in Planning and MTEF. She served as a member of the Gandaki Provincial Policy and Planning Commission.

members.name: Dr. Shankar K Shrestha
members.bio: Dr. Shrestha has more than 20 years of work experience as a teaching professional and statistician, specializing in statistical analysis and data diagnostics.

members.name: Dr. Keshav Kumar Acharya (Senior Consultant)
members.bio: With over 25 years of experience, Dr. Acharya specializes in climate resilience, service delivery, and social accountability, having consulted for international and domestic agencies.

members.name: Er. Umesh Agrawal
members.qualification: Civil Engineer, Master in Urban Planning
members.bio: Er. Agrawal has over 20 years of experience in urban infrastructure, planning, and project appraisal. He holds degrees in Civil Engineering, Urban Planning, and an MBA.

members.name: Dambar Singh Pujara
members.bio: Mr. Pujara has 20 years of GIS expertise in Digital Mapping and database management. He is a GIS trainer with in-depth knowledge of ArcGIS and satellite image processing.
